executive_summary.name: Ankith C Shenoy
executive_summary.experience: 5.2 years in Business Intelligence, specializing in database management, data analysis, and visualization.
key_strengths: Expertise in SQL, Tableau, and Power BI
Strong data modeling and ETL knowledge
Ability to translate business needs into actionable insights
Experience in dashboard migration and optimization
executive_summary.career_aspiration: Seeking opportunities to lead BI initiatives, optimize data solutions, and drive business intelligence strategies.

education.degree: B.E. in Electronics and Communications Engineering

key_contributions: Analyzed data to generate insights and build dashboards in Tableau.
Implemented access control and row-level security.
Monitored dashboard schedule refresh and data extracts.
Collaborated with program managers to understand business needs.
Developed optimized data marts using dimensional modeling.
Designed and implemented ETL processes for data loading.
Created analytical dashboards summarizing KPIs for automation solutions.
Restricted dashboard accessibility based on user roles.
Trained in infrastructure technologies such as cloud, VMs, and databases.
Maintained a retail analytics solution for an international restaurant.
Developed dashboards and data entry forms to streamline business processes.
Implemented multilingual dashboards to improve user accessibility.

strengths: Proficiency in Tableau, Power BI, and SQL
Experience in migrating dashboards and managing BI lifecycle
Strong business understanding and stakeholder communication
Hands-on experience in data modeling and ETL processes
weaknesses: Limited exposure to cloud-based BI platforms
Needs experience in advanced machine learning analytics

education.event: Completed B.E. in Electronics and Communications Engineering

work_experience.event: Business Data Analyst at Anakage Technologies

hr_dashboard_insights.growth_potential: Strong candidate for senior BI roles
